Posts.Content: I was experiencing horrible nightsweats and hot flashes but since I started taking Evening Primrose Oil, I rarely experience any of these side effects anymore. Hope this helps you too. God Bless, Betsy
Posts.Title: Excessive sweating caused by meds?

Posts.Content: I would have done the same exact thing. You couldn't let this abuse continue. At least now you have peace of mind that your cousin will no longer be physically abused by his own daughter and hopefully his daughter will get the much needed help she so desperately needs. Keeping you all in my prayers.
Posts.Title: Did i do the right thing?

Posts.Content: I start my radiation treatments on November 3 and if everything goes well they will end two days before Christmas! I got my cat scan yesterday and was given tattoos.
Posts.Title: Just finished radiation hooray!

Posts.Content: Shortly after receiving chemo (which ended in this May) I noticed the vision in my "right" eye has deteriorated to the point where everything is pretty much a blurr. I used to have good vision in both eyes. My left eye wasn't effected. I intend to go to an eye doctor in January (after my radiation treatments end). I am wondering if I have a cataract as I know this can be a side effect of chemo. I'm hoping it's a cataract and it can be corrected. Has anyone had their vision affected by chemo? What was your outcome? Thank you to all who respond. God Bless, Betsy
Posts.Title: Vision: Has anyone had their vision deteriorate?

Posts.Content: I just said a prayer for you and your mom. With God, All things are possible. Please keep us posted on your mom. God bless you both.
Posts.Title: plz pray for my mother ,she is suffering from breast cancer and bone infection
